1.0.1.name: wordpress/fasqu-draft
1.0.1.description: This plug-in allow you to send all your new posts to FASQu Drafts. For to use this plugin you must register as an Expert in http://www.fasqu.com and get the FASQu API Key ( api.fasqu.com/get_api_key.php ). Additionally plugin includes widget "FASQu Search" and function to show link "Add Page to FASQu" after each post in your blog.
